author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss the thunderbird pro services including thundermail, a webmail powered by thunderbird that will be an opensource alternative to Gmail. Mozilla is also developing several other office/communication apps to be used along side thundermail to create a FOSS suite of online office apps.

https://blog.thunderbird.net/2025/04/thundermail-and-thunderbird-pro-services/
